title: Impact of Infrastructure on Copper, Gold and Crypto
itunes:title: Impact of Infrastructure on Copper, Gold and Crypto
description:
Everett Millman, Precious Metals Specialist with Gainesville Coins, on the outlook for gold, metals and crypto. Ibrahim AlHusseini, Founder & Managing Partner of PE firm FullCycle, on climate investing and the epochal new climate report that the earth is warming faster. Rania Sedhom, Managing Partner of the Sedhom Law Group, on Governor Cuomo’s sexual harassment case. Mark Douglas, CEO & Founder of MNTN, on why Nielsen ratings are outdated. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
